all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
I will be merciful unto you, for I have given unto you the kingdom.
Doctrine and Covenants 64:4
Quote of the Day
"Wholeness does not necessarily mean physical and emotional restoration in this life. Wholeness is born of faith in and conversion to Jesus Christ."
President Camille N. Johnson | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
